title: Looking for players for next Oceanic Open Ladder Split and Ranked, Plat +
body:
Looking for consistent players to play in the next **Oceanic Open Ladder** Split and also to climb ranked together. Players may be put in a trial if more than one player both want to play in a role. The trial would consist of 2-3 games in dynamic ranked games.

**Requirements**:
Must play daily (5 times a week)
Players that are within the range of Plat 5 - Master
Microphone
Teamspeak

**Applying:**
Leave a comment below of your:

IGN:
Role:
Availability:

**Roles that are currently available:**
Top
Jungle

Expect an add from 'Azus' if you applied, thanks guys :)

replies.body:
Hey, my name is Rain, and I'm interested in joining a competitive ranked team, so if that's something you can offer me, that'd be fantastic. Cheers.
